name: Get Blocked!
description:
If any of the shifting blocks collide with you, game over!
To aid your escape, you wield the powers to erase blocks, recall blocks from the past, and teleport!

Unfinished game about escaping from procedurally generated levels.

You can still play and complete it, but it might be a little easy/uninteresting.

Made it for 7DRL although I'm not sure it is exactly a Roguelike yet....

Controls

Click "GAME!" to start. Press ESC while in-game to return to the menu.

WASD to move.

Initiate a spell cast with E, R, or T, depending on the spell.

Once initiated, move the spell cursor with WASD, then press the spell key again to execute the spell.

Press Q at any point to cancel the spell, or press a different spell key to switch to that spell instead.

In the future I intend to add:
  • A real title screen and actual fonts so all the text is not blurry
  • One additional requirement before escaping each level (a lever that reveals the ladder or something)
  • A way to defeat the shifting blocks (push them into pits?)
  • Potentially a spell upgrade system, to let you extend the range/aoe of your spells, or acquire more mana to spend on them.
  • More levels/an infinite mode
  • More interesting things within levels - a fountain to refill mana, other traps?
Feedback and Bugs

There seems to be an issue with the level counter at the moment, but you should be able to win after 5 levels regardless.

I'm keen to hear any feedback about how I could make this more fun, or if you spot any other bugs.

Thanks!
